public static class Knot3.Lerp extends Knot3.AbstrEasing
A functional class to ease between two knots with linear interpolation.

  • Method Details

    • applyUnclamped

      public Knot3 applyUnclamped(Knot3 origin, Knot3 dest, float step, Knot3 target)
      Eases between two knots by a step using the formula (1.0 - t) * a + t * b . Promotes the step from a float to a double.
      Specified by:
      applyUnclamped in class Knot3.AbstrEasing
      Parameters:
      origin - the origin knot
      dest - the destination knot
      step - the step
      target - the output knot
      Returns:
      the eased knot
